Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobjects.Entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Savable, java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bandit, Goblin, Murderbot, Mutant, Player, Zombie

extends java.lang.Object
implements Savable, java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity​(int health,
              int damage,
              int defense,
              java.lang.String name)
        Main constructor used for entities
        Parameters:
        health - Max health
        damage - Base damage
        defense - Base defense
        name - Name of the entity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if health, damage, or defense are less than 0, or if name is empty

      • Entity

        public Entity​(int health,
              int maxHealth,
              int damage,
              int defense,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.util.ArrayList<Items> inventory,
              Weapon weapon,
              Armor armor)
        Entity constructor used when loading an entity from a save file
        Parameters:
        health - Entity current health
        maxHealth - Entity maximum health
        damage - Base damage
        defense - Base defense
        name - Name of the entity
        inventory - The array list containing all Items owned by the Entity
        weapon - The weapon currently equipped by the Entity
        armor - The armor currently equipped by the Entity

      • addConsumable

        public void addConsumable​(Consumable consumable)
        Adds consumable(s) to the inventory array list. Stacks the consumables if adding more of a consumable which is already stored in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        consumable - Consumable to be added

      • removeConsumable

        public void removeConsumable​(Consumable consumable)
        Reduces amount of consumable in inventory, or removes the consumable if amount <= 1
        Parameters:
        consumable - Consumable to be removed

      • saveInstance

        public void saveInstance​(java.io.FileWriter saveFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Savable
        Save an instance of the class implementing Savable to a text file. Note this method should not close the FileWriter it takes as an argument.
        Specified by:
        saveInstance in interface Savable
        Parameters:
        saveFile - FileWriter used to write to text file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - due to FileWriter
